title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.500 - Meat pies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.500 - Meat pies

State Regulations

Meat pies such as "Beef Pie", "Veal Pie" and "Pork Pie"
shall contain meat of the species specified on the label, in an amount not less
than 25 percent of all ingredients including crust and shall be computed on the
basis of the fresh uncooked meat. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
319.500

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
